summary: This document appears to be an internal list of positions within Deutsche Bank, specifically detailing members of a committee and their respective roles. It includes names, titles, and the legal entities they are associated with, primarily focusing on the Americas region.

persons.name: Steven Ekert
persons.context: Steven Ekert is listed as the Chairperson and Chief Risk Officer for the Americas region at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Stuart Clarke
persons.context: Stuart Clarke serves as the Vice-chairperson and Chief Operating Officer for the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Steven Reich
persons.context: Steven Reich is identified as the General Counsel for the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Francis Kelly
persons.role: Head of Government and Public Affairs — Americas
persons.context: Francis Kelly holds the position of Head of Government and Public Affairs for the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Eric Smith
persons.context: Eric Smith is the Chief Financial Officer for the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Jan Ford
persons.context: Jan Ford is the Regional Head of Compliance for the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Rich Weber
persons.context: Rich Weber is responsible for Anti-Financial Crime in the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Stephen Doka
persons.context: Stephen Doka is the Regional Head of Investigation at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Ann Rodriguez
persons.context: Ann Rodriguez serves as the Regional Head of Non-Financial Risk Management for the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Meghan Gervase
persons.context: Meghan Gervase is the Secretary for Non-Financial Risk Management in the Americas at Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The document lists various positions held by individuals at Deutsche Bank in the Americas region.
All individuals mentioned are associated with Deutsche Bank and hold significant roles within the organization.
The document is marked as confidential and intended for internal use only.
